Author: just_andjela

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,212Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: Grayson drifted, finally, into a hazy dreamscape. He found himself in a familiar alleyway, the kind that reeked of stale pizza and forgotten potential. But something was off. The alley was bathed in an ethereal, almost comforting, moonlight. He was talking to someone, a figure shrouded in a heavy, dark cloak. He couldn't make out their features, only the faintest glint of green eyes in the shadow of the hood.

entry.title: Blood
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,109Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 28

Summary: Talon AU. Complete.After his parents were murdered, Dick was recruited into The Court of Owls, giving his loyalty in exchange for revenge. Sent on a task to kill Batman and his son, Dick learns that his path could have gone another way--that he was meant to be adopted by Bruce Wayne. With his trials coming up, Dick is on his final path to becoming a Talon, and must hurry to find the truth behind his origins and his heritage before giving his life to the Owls completely. His struggle is similarly faced by Damian, who gave up the assassin lifestyle but struggles to redeem himself for his old ways.
